_category.title: Math Functions
_category.description: ABS, CEIL, FLOOR, ROUND, POWER, SQRT

math-1.title: Absolute Value and Sign
math-1.sql:
SELECT
  unit_price,
  unit_price - 20 AS price_diff,
  ABS(unit_price - 20) AS abs_diff,
  SIGN(unit_price - 20) AS sign_indicator
FROM products
LIMIT 10;
math-1.description: Calculate absolute values and sign indicators for price differences

math-2.title: Rounding Functions
math-2.sql:
SELECT
  unit_price,
  ROUND(unit_price) AS rounded,
  ROUND(unit_price, 1) AS one_decimal,
  FLOOR(unit_price) AS floor_value,
  CEIL(unit_price) AS ceiling_value
FROM products
WHERE unit_price IS NOT NULL
LIMIT 10;
math-2.description: Demonstrate various rounding methods for numeric values

math-3.title: Power and Square Root
math-3.sql:
SELECT
  unit_price,
  POWER(unit_price, 2) AS squared,
  SQRT(unit_price) AS square_root,
  ROUND(SQRT(unit_price), 2) AS sqrt_rounded
FROM products
WHERE unit_price > 0
LIMIT 10;
math-3.description: Calculate squares, square roots, and combinations

math-4.title: Modulo (Remainder)
math-4.sql:
SELECT
  product_id,
  product_name,
  MOD(product_id, 3) AS group_number,
  CASE
    WHEN MOD(product_id, 3) = 0 THEN 'Group A'
    WHEN MOD(product_id, 3) = 1 THEN 'Group B'
    ELSE 'Group C'
  END AS group_name
FROM products
ORDER BY product_id
LIMIT 15;
math-4.description: Use MOD to divide products into rotating groups

math-5.title: Logarithmic Functions
math-5.sql:
SELECT
  unit_price,
  ROUND(LN(unit_price), 2) AS natural_log,
  ROUND(LOG10(unit_price), 2) AS log_base_10,
  ROUND(EXP(1.0), 4) AS e_constant
FROM products
WHERE unit_price > 0
LIMIT 10;
math-5.description: Calculate natural logarithms, base-10 logarithms, and exponentials

math-6.title: Trigonometric Functions
math-6.sql:
SELECT
  ROUND(PI(), 6) AS pi_value,
  ROUND(SIN(PI() / 2), 4) AS sin_90_degrees,
  ROUND(COS(PI()), 4) AS cos_180_degrees,
  ROUND(TAN(PI() / 4), 4) AS tan_45_degrees
FROM (SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 1) AS dummy;
math-6.description: Demonstrate trigonometric functions with common angles

math-7.title: Inverse Trigonometric Functions
math-7.sql:
SELECT
  ROUND(ASIN(1.0), 4) AS asin_1,
  ROUND(ACOS(0.0), 4) AS acos_0,
  ROUND(ATAN(1.0), 4) AS atan_1,
  ROUND(ATAN2(1.0, 1.0), 4) AS atan2_1_1
FROM (SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 1) AS dummy;
math-7.description: Calculate inverse trigonometric functions (arcsin, arccos, arctan)

math-8.title: Angle Conversions
math-8.sql:
SELECT
  180 AS degrees,
  ROUND(RADIANS(180), 4) AS radians,
  ROUND(DEGREES(PI()), 2) AS back_to_degrees
FROM (SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 1) AS dummy;

math-9.title: GREATEST and LEAST
math-9.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  unit_price,
  units_in_stock,
  GREATEST(unit_price, units_in_stock) AS max_value,
  LEAST(unit_price, units_in_stock) AS min_value
FROM products
WHERE unit_price IS NOT NULL AND units_in_stock IS NOT NULL
LIMIT 10;
math-9.description: Find maximum and minimum values across columns

math-10.title: Price Calculations
math-10.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  unit_price,
  ROUND(unit_price * 1.08, 2) AS with_tax,
  ROUND(unit_price * 0.9, 2) AS discounted,
  FLOOR(unit_price) || '.99' AS psychological_price
FROM products
WHERE unit_price > 0
ORDER BY unit_price DESC
LIMIT 10;
math-10.description: Practical business calculations: taxes, discounts, and pricing strategies
